content:
Hello! I am trying to create a URL for anonymized access for manuscript submission to a journal with a double-blind review. I followed the directions found here under Private URL to Review Unpublished Dataset. But when I click on “Private URL” in the drop down menu it only gives me an option for "Create Private URL" but no option appears to "Create URL for Anonymized Access" as described.

Thanks for your help!

@Regan Bernhard hi, it's confusing. We should edit those directions.

For it to work your sysadmin needs to set this: https://guides.dataverse.org/en/6.2/installation/config.html#anonymizedfieldtypenames
Sure, happy to help. :grinning:
Maybe a warning/note should be added for such features with something akin to "this feature is not enabled by default, see {link to the appropriate section of the configuration guide} to enable it."
Probably at the end of the section on the feature so it doesn't deter users from learning about new features
@Dimitri Szabo that sounds great. If you'd like to open an issue, I'd appreciate it!

Done! I started listing a few features with the same issue.
I modified a little bit the note's text to reuse an existing text from the guide and specify that the enabling has to be done by an admin.
Oh, great. Perhaps you could start a thread in #docs about it. Thanks!
You read my mind :sweat_smile:
